title: Lesson-Level Detection Debugging Session
details:
## Current Issue: Lesson-Level Folders Not Being Detected

### Problem Statement
The CLI generate-index command is not detecting lesson-level folders (level 5) when using --template-types lesson. Only detecting levels 2-4 (program, course, class, module).

### Directory Structure Confirmed
- Vault root: C:/Users/danshue.REDMOND/Vault/01_Projects/MBA/Value Chain Management/Operations Management/
- Lesson folders exist at level 5, e.g.: "Lesson 1 - Introduction to Operations Management"
- Lesson folders contain subdirectories: Readings/, Transcripts/, Notes/

### Test Commands Used
1. `na.exe vault generate-index "C:/Users/danshue.REDMOND/Vault/01_Projects/MBA/Value Chain Management/Operations Management/" --template-types lesson --debug`
2. `na.exe vault generate-index "C:/Users/danshue.REDMOND/Vault/01_Projects/MBA/Value Chain Management/Operations Management/" --template-types lesson --override-vault-root --debug`

### Observations
- CLI detects folders at levels 2, 3, 4 but NOT level 5
- No folders found when filtering for lesson template type
- Template types are not being found for detected folders
- --override-vault-root appears to be a boolean flag (not path parameter)

### Code Status
- CalculateHierarchyLevel moved to MetadataHierarchyDetector ✅
- Interface updated with new methods ✅
- VaultIndexBatchProcessor updated to use instance methods ✅
- Code compiles successfully ✅

### Next Steps Needed
1. Investigate why hierarchy level calculation stops at level 4
2. Verify lesson template exists and is properly mapped
3. Debug folder detection logic in VaultIndexBatchProcessor
4. Ensure proper template type filtering logic
